entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:42 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 10:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
